QuestData.Title: On Spirit's Wings
QuestData.Description: If the Mok'Nathal are tormented by the Bloodmaul ogres, then I will stop them and their followers. Ogres are simple creatures, and there is little profit they could gain from harassing the Mok'Nathal.$b$bThere must be something more to this. $n, take Spirit, my hawk, and spy upon the conversations of the Bloodmaul's leaders. He may go undetected where we cannot.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find a Bloodmaul Taskmaster and a Bloodmaul Soothsayer engaged in conversation, then use Rexxar's Whistle to summon Spirit to spy on them.
QuestData.RewardText: <Spirit perches upon Rexxar's shoulder, while Rexxar listens intently.>$B$BSo it is the sons of Gruul that are behind the ogres' actions. They command the Bloodmaul ogres to destroy the Mok'Nathal to gain their favor.

Objectives.Objective: Eavesdrop on the Bloodmaul ogres' plans
